participant_1.background:
I am proud of my career, but I still miss my dad.
i enjoy vacations at the beach.
I wake up early and enjoy a cup of coffee with my boyfriend before we head to work.
I have no siblings, but I love spending time with my friends and family at our cabin in the woods on the lake.
my favorite band is ween.

participant_2.background:
I've learned how to manage my time better and prioritize my tasks.
i love to dance.
My hair is a deep blood red, the same color as the blood of my enemies.
I try to stay in touch with my family as often as I can.
i clean houses for extra money.

content.text: Hello! What is your favorite thing to do on the weekends?
I really love to dance. I take a lot of classes and try to go out dancing as often as I can.
That is so awesome! What kind of dance do you like to do?
I really like hip hop and ballroom. I also like to try out new things.
That's really cool! I love trying new things as well. I do a lot of hiking and camping.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love being outdoors. I live near the lake and I love to go swimming and fishing.
That sounds amazing! I love being near the water. I live in the city, but I try to get to the beach as often as I can.
I wish I lived near the beach. I would go all the time.
It's really beautiful. I love to go swimming and sunbathe.
That sounds amazing! I love being in the sun.
Yeah, it's so relaxing. I also like to go kayaking.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never tried kayaking before.
It's really easy to learn. You should try it sometime!
I will! I'm always looking for new things to try.
I'm glad! I love trying new things too. It's so much fun to explore new things and meet new people.
I agree! It's the best way to learn and grow.
